title: The Tommies’ final acts
itunes:title: The Tommies’ final acts
itunes:subtitle: Jonathan Ruffle, creator of the BBC Radio 4 historical drama Tommies, explores the situation on the front line in August 1918 as the First World War approached its end
description:
Jonathan Ruffle, creator of the BBC Radio 4 historical drama Tommies, explores the situation on the front line in August 1918 as the First World War approached its end

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
